explanation: To complete the task of putting a heated mug on the coffee maker, the objects involved would be the Mug and the Coffee Maker. The other objects such as Statue, ButterKnife, Kettle, Fork, Spoon, Egg, Knife, SoapBottle, Tomato, Bowl, PepperShaker, Lettuce, Pan, Cup, Ladle, Apple, Vase, Potato, Pot, Bread, Plate, Spatula, PaperTowelRoll, DishSponge, SaltShaker would not be directly involved in this task.
